thread.title: Stubblr, the New Mobile Ticket Marketplace, Delights Fans With "You're in!" Event Giveaway Series

author: cbs8
title: Stubblr, the New Mobile Ticket Marketplace, Delights Fans With "You're in!" Event Giveaway Series
text:
Stubblr
Stubblr is sending two winners to TIDAL X 10:20 concert featuring Beyonce, Jay-Z, Nicki Minaj and Usher at Barclays Center October 20th, 2015
BROOKLYN, N.Y. , Oct 16, 2015 /PRNewswire/ -- Stubblr, the new, fan-first sports, concert and theater mobile ticketing app is rewarding early-adopters with "You're In!", a premiere event giveaway series.
Photo - http://photos.prnewswire.com/prnh/20151015/277554
Stubblr -- a location-based mobile ticket marketplace – is celebrating its launch in the App Store with a series of giveaways including tickets to the Mets playoffs at Citi Field, and premiere seats at the upcoming TIDAL X 10:20 concert October 20th at Barclays Center featuring Beyonce, Jay-Z, Nicki Minaj, Usher and more.
Stubblr's first "You're In!" winner, Kyle Boris of NJ, was awarded tickets at Monday's coveted NY Mets NLDS faceoff with the LA Dodgers at Citi Field. Tickets were presented by Stubblr Co-Founders Paul Yankowitz and Steven Rosenberg .
Said Yankowitz: "We're thrilled that fans are embracing Stubblr as a new, fast and fair way to find, buy and sell tickets. As avid sports and concert-goers, Steve and I wanted to reward new users with special opportunities to attend some of the most sought-after events coming up this Fall."
To enter, fans simply download Stubblr's free app and post a request for their desired contest event – no purchase necessary.
The Stubblr app for iOS combines geo-location and social components to help fans safely and easily find buyers and sellers of last-minute tickets, in real-time.
Stubblr's 5 star mobile app for iOS is available now with an Android version coming soon.
STUBBLR FEATURES
Post ticket requests and deals Find buyers and sellers around you with geo-location Instantly chat with users to negotiate and transact Social profiles for verification Digital payments and buyer ticket validation Download Stubblr from the App Store: http://bit.ly/stubblr
Web site: stubblr.com
Facebook: /stubblr
Twitter: @Stubblr
Instagram: @Stubblr_App
Press contact:
Nikke Slight
App-Promo
Email: nikke@app-promo.com
Tel: 917-971-7169
